body:
Is it possible in nearest future to change current rules to "Magic Rules" ?

combat damage is automatically assigned :
defending player determines order of blockers while declaring blockers
attacker deals lethal combat damage in order of blockers

and

triggered abilities are ordered on the stack automatically
author: [OLEGtheK...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/106579007142717194127/)
title: Damage assign and triggers order

comments.author: [eng60...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/110165659478391424989/)

comments.body:
I'm in favor of making the engine closer to magic rules without making the game too difficult for the AI.

As far I can tell changing it so that the attacker orders the blockers instead of the defender does not increase the complexity of the game for the AI since this decision has to be made anyway.

Making it possible to assign damage and order triggers would lead to a much more complicated game for the AI, not to mention a more complicated interface for the user.

The difficulty with big changes such as this is that we are currently short on developer time.

**Labels:** -Type-Defect Type-Enhancement
